job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: BASIC QUALIFICATIONS: <br>Four-year college degree in Information Technology, Information Security, related field or equivalent work experience <br>Experience with SQL Server: Stored procedures, Server Replication, Transactional Replication <br>Five years of experience in a large enterprise in an engineering or delivery role <br>Experience with Azure: Azure Service Fabric, Azure Functions, Service Bus, Azure Storage services like Cosmos <br>Experience in one of these languages: C, C#, .NET Technologies, JavaScript, Typescript <br>Five years of experience working with scripting languages and other automation tools, e.g., PowerShell, etc. <br>Excellent analytical ability and communications skills <br>Interpersonal relationship skills <br>Ability to manage multiple tasks simultaneously

company.name: ATD Technology, LLC., a full-service Staffing & Recruiting Agency
